Row.Text: Saga Hero

A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in Settlements with a [icon:CITY_RURAL] Þingstaðr, and the specific Saga Hero received is random. Each Saga Hero can only be received once. Cost increases per Saga Hero trained.
Egill Skallagrímsson
Activate on an Fleet Commander. When you defeat an enemy Unit in its Command Radius receive [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of the defeated Unit's strength.
Gísli Sursson
Activate on a Military Unit. This Unit gains the Stealth Ability, becoming invisible to Units that are not in an adjacent tile.
Grettir Ásmundarson
Activate on an Army Commander. Nearby Infantry Units gain the Splash ability, enemy units in tiles adjacent to the target take 25% damage.
Kjartan Óláfsson
Activate on a foreign Pillaged tile. Gain 1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic.
Guðrún Ósvífrsdóttir
Activate on a Commander. All Units of its domain in the Command Radius are [icon:Action_Heal] Healed fully.
Hrafnkell Hallfreðsson

Activate on a Temple. Whenever you Coastal Raid it spreads [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion to the Settlement that has been Coastal Raided. If the tile Raided is an Improvement the Rural Religion changes, if the tile is an Urban tile the Urban Religion changes.
Njáll Þorgeirsson
Activate on a þingstaðr. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on þingstaðr in this Settlement for each Celebration.
Gunnarr Hámundarson
Activate on an Army or Fleet Commander with a Military Unit in the same tile. This Commander gains the Order Commendation.
Guðríðr Þorbjarnardóttir
Activate on a Naval Unit. This Unit gains +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement and +1 [icon:Action_Showall] Sight.
Freydís Eiríksdóttir
Activate on a Naval Unit. This turn, Naval Units can [icon:Action_Pillage] Coastal Raid for no [icon:Action_Move] Movement cost.
